==== PC Card Slots ====
* 1 Type I/II 32-bit card bus (also support 16-bit)

==== External Ports ====
* 2 USB 2.0 ports
* 1 VGA (15-pin)
* 1 RJ -11
* 1 RJ -45 (LAN)
* 1 headphone-out
* 1 microphone-in
* TV-Out (S-video)

==== Dimensions ====
* 33.4 cm (L) x 23.06 cm (W) x 3.29 cm (min H) / 3.89 cm (max H)
* Weight 2.43kg

==== Security (1) ====
* Kensington® MicroSaver lock slot
* Power-on password
* Accepts 3rd party security lock devices

==== Power ====
* 6-Cell Lithium-Ion (43Whr)
* 65W AC adapter

* (1) No existe in notebook
